title: SnapAMeal
description: An AI-powered health and wellness social platform with intelligent meal recognition, personalized coaching, and community features.
fullDescription: Developed during Week 2 of the Gauntlet AI intensive program, SnapAMeal is an advanced AI-powered health and wellness social platform built with Flutter and Firebase, featuring revolutionary intelligent meal recognition, comprehensive health tracking, personalized AI coaching, community features, and cutting-edge nutritional analysis. Originally inspired by Snapchat's social mechanics, SnapAMeal has evolved into a complete health transformation platform with state-of-the-art meal analysis capabilities.
